duties_responsibilities.duty: Proactively identify, develop, and maintain a quality network of business relationships for new mortgage lending opportunities.
Interview new and existing customers to determine their loan needs and advise on appropriate products, terms, and pricing.
Generate complete mortgage applications and ensure compliance with industry and regulatory guidelines.
Achieve sales and referral goals by providing exceptional customer experience and referring clients to other financial products and services.
Market to and manage referral relationships, and participate in community efforts to promote home ownership.
Provide status updates and assist with the collection of any trailing borrower documentation needed to complete loan processing and closing.
Attend required production meetings and complete all industry-required training.
Ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and internal policies.
Keep up to date with changing regulations and policies.

education_certification.credential: 2+ years of demonstrated networking and/or referral sales experience. Mortgage industry experience preferred. Bachelor's degree in a relevant field preferred.
